title: Distance travelled to work
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: Modified version of the CT1109 - Workplace table: Distance travelled to work by industry (2 digits). The data has been updated for the latest local authority structural changes and simplified industry breakdown as used in associated article. Forms part of the datasets that comprise the ONS article publication "Coronavirus and travel to work [month/year]", along with "Method of Travel to work".
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to latest dataset under heading "Your download option".
sizingNotes: Simple table structure, one tab of data already in tidy data like format.
